byline.contributor: Fernanda Santos reported from Phoenix, and Christine Hauser from New York.
byline.original: By FERNANDA SANTOS and CHRISTINE HAUSER

abstract: Vanessa Ruiz, Arizona news anchor, defends her correct Spanish pronunciation during broadcasts; continuing debate over Spanish-speaking in America is intense in Arizona, which has banned bilingual education despite 30 percent Hispanic population.
lead_paragraph: The anchor, Vanessa Ruiz, said some viewers had questioned her way of pronouncing Spanish words.

headline.main: Arizona News Anchor Is Drawn Into Debate on Her Accent and the Use of Spanish
headline.print_headline: News Anchor Is Drawn Into Debate on Her Accent and the Use of Spanish
